original_text: Every day I was with you, teaching in the temple courts, and you did not arrest me. But the Scriptures must be fulfilled.”
korean_text: 내가 날마다 너희와 함께 성전에 있으면서 가르쳤으되 너희가 나를 잡지 아니하였도다 그러나 이는 성경을 이루려 함이니라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Every day I was with you
and you did not arrest me
But the Scriptures must be fulfilled
